summary:
Welcome to the Daily Song-A-Day Sale! - Every day we sell editions of the new song via sound.xyz's Optimism NFT contract. After the end of an edition's sales we will select one purchaser to receive the 1/1 version of the song on the mainnet Song-a-Day NFT contract.

 What is this? - Song A Day NFT is a growing collection of songs that live on the Ethereum Blockchain. It began over 4 years ago with this tweet: I've been making one song every day since January 1st, 2009 (Pre-Ethereum!) This project represents my entire life's work. Song A Day NFT is also what makes you eligible to become a member of SongADAO.
